Title: Silverlight Photo Browser
Description:
This is the server side implementation of Panaglobe Silverlight Photo browser. You can reuse, modify, redistribute it as you want.

The client browser is a demo browser with some limitations, it must be licensed or you have create a new implementation.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is the server side implementation of Panaglobe Silverlight Photo browser. You can reuse, modify, redistribute it as you want.

The client browser is a demo browser with some limitations, it must be licensed or you have create a new implementation.

before run



Do not forget to remove read-only flag from database in app_data folder before run, otherwise you cannot edit photos, albums, because the database will be read-only.

If you haven't .\SQLEXPRESS named instance of SQL Server, change the following code before run (in app_code\WebCommon.cs):

public static SqlConnection CreateConnection()
{
string connectionString = string.Format(@"Data Source=.\SQLEXPRESS;AttachDbFilename={0};Integrated Security=True;User Instance=True",
HttpContext.Current.Server.MapPath("~/App_Data/Database.mdf"));

SqlConnection connection = new SqlConnection();
connection.ConnectionString = connectionString;
connection.Open();

return connection;
}
